body.p: After my best regards for you and Yours, permit me to request of you, a continuation of a former favor, for my 'sake' please once more Respite the case of the Commonwealth vs John Smoots on a forfeited Recognizance of Knoosh & Rockabrand, Smoots security -- $200 I have paid Col: Stanton's percent as Prosecuting attorney, and there is due the Commonwealth but $140,00 I am in honor bound to keep pay it -- to hold Smoots harmless, as I got him in to it -- and recd collateral as Security which as yet have avaled me little -- If you will give me this last indulgence (as I can without Sacrificing my property pay it before June 1863) by sending me the Respite for one Year, you will confer an Everlasting favor to one who is and has been your true friend and advocate -- I had intended to go down and see you in person, but find it impossible at the present time, hoping you will I will receive your favor by the bearer Jas D Rankins who is all right -- the son of a true friend of Yours, -- I remain your Excellencys friend & obt Servt
